title: U.S. Government Game Simulation: The Journey of Citizenship

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of governmental structures and civic rights
context.additional_context: Game-based learning program in a BYOD environment, simulating realistic citizenship processes to understand the U.S. government system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the U.S. Constitution and the roles of government agencies through in-game quests.
Learners can perform legal procedures and policy decisions required for virtual citizenship acquisition with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze three or more cases of federal-state government interactions through team-based problem-solving activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
